title: Who Could Beat Sinner and Alcaraz in Tennis?
summary: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz are two top tennis players who have won many big tournaments recently. They won all the last eight Grand Slam events, which are the most important tennis competitions. This article asks if anyone can beat them in 2026. It talks about other players who might challenge them, like Ben Shelton. Shelton is a young American player with a very fast serve. He has done well in some Grand Slams but lost to Sinner and Alcaraz. The article includes opinions from experts, like coach Patrick Mouratoglou, who says it's hard to imagine others catching up because Sinner and Alcaraz are so good. It encourages readers to think about who might win next.
